name: Mad Monkey Downtown
description:
Head up to our fantastic rooftop for skyline views and sunny vibes, or unwind in our charming courtyard – both perfect spots for mingling and making new friends. Inside, our common areas buzz with energy, featuring a cozy TV room for kicking back. 

Welcome to Mad Monkey Downtown, your ultimate social hub right in the beating heart of Sydney's Kings Cross! Part of the renowned Mad Monkey Backpackers Group, we're dedicated to bringing travellers together and creating unforgettable Sydney adventures as part of our vibrant Mad Monkey Family.
Our hostel is designed for connection and good times. We thrive on our social atmosphere, constantly hosting awesome group events and offering discounted tickets for epic pub crawls to help you dive into Sydney's legendary nightlife. Plus, start your day right with free barista coffee available at the Happy Travels shop!

Choose from comfortable 4-bed dorms or opt for a private room. All our dorms prioritse your comfort with privacy screens on every bed and individual power points to keep your devices charged. All rooms have clean, shared bathroom facilities, and fresh linen is always provided.

Your stay includes:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Large, Secure Lockers (bring your own padlock)
- Complimentary Tea & Coffee
- Massive TV/Gaming Room 
- Bespoke Rooftop 
- Organised Social Events 7 days a week
- Free Barista Coffee (at Happy Travels)

You'll love our prime location directly in the heart of Kings Cross, you're surrounded by Sydney's most vibrant nightlife, cafes, and eateries. Plus, with the train station just a 2-minute walk, exploring the CBD, Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches is incredibly convenient.

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception hours are 8 am - 8 pm. If you're checking in after these hours, please give us a call beforehand.
- Check-out is before 10 am and check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid passport or international passport is needed for check-in.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- Please note: No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

Join us at Mad Monkey Downtown – your gateway to an amazing Sydney adventure with new friends!.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled. 
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

houseRules.notes:
- Cancellations within 24 hours and no shows will be charged a cancellation fee equal to one night stay.
- If you cancel a Non-Refundable Rate you will still be charged the full amount of the booking, this can not be refunded or moved to a different date. 
- We do not accept guests under the age of 18 years old in shared dormitory rooms.  
- Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.
- Prices are quoted in AUD and are subject to change daily. 
- Valid credit card (in the guests name) and a valid passport are required upon check in.
- If you have made a reservation through an (online) travel agency you must cancel or modify through the agency. 
- The following payment methods are accepted; cash, credit or debit cards (Visa and MasterCard only). We do not accept American Express. All credit or debit cards incur a 1% payment fee. 
- The guest will be responsible for any loss or damage caused at the hostel by guests or visitors of guests. 
- $20 fee will be charged for the loss or non-return of any keys to reception upon check out.
- When booking multiple beds in a shared dorm, we cannot guarantee to put people on the same booking in the same room, however we will do our best.
- Guests may not consume or store food and drinks in their rooms. Any alcohol or food found in the rooms will be removed. 
- Smoking is only permitted within the designated smoking areas.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
